title: Scaffolding Strategies to Promote Critical Thinking in Online Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Elementary Educational Theories and Online Learning Environments
context.additional_context: Focuses on pre-service teachers designing and facilitating online classes in simulation/VR environments while applying scaffolding strategies that promote critical thinking

learning_goals: Learners design and apply ≥3 scaffolding strategies to promote critical thinking in simulation/VR environments
Learners revise and improve their own scaffolding strategies through peer feedback and self-reflection
Learners generate ≥5 open-ended questions that expand learners' thinking in online educational contexts

resources: Online Collaboration Tools (Padlet, Google Docs, etc.)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
